title: 820 2936 after 2 - 5 min image flash and goes down!
message:
Hey guys, 

working on 820 2936, no liquid damage, i'm the first on to disassembly. after 2- 5 min working the image flash,fan's go high and shut down!! Like this vdeo: 

[url]https://drive.google.com/file/d/16_bFOL6Fb93mYqfpntbjzm48Tp0iGCKz/view?usp=sharing[/url]

i already try new rams, only one ram in each slot. 
already test the board in other mac and same history. 

possibly processor issue?? 

thanks

title: 820 2936 after 2 - 5 min image flash and goes down!
message:
Does it stay on if you lerave it in boot menu?
Can you run ASD EFI?
You could try new BIOS, with clean ME...

title: 820 2936 after 2 - 5 min image flash and goes down!
message:
yes stay on!! when i put ASD the Image flash's can't see what the problem is!! some times works well 5 - 10 min some times 10 sec after i turn on!! 

Already test with a clean_me bios and same history!!!

title: 820 2936 after 2 - 5 min image flash and goes down!
message:
Can you enter to OSX in SMC bypass mode?
Don't forget the simply things, like SMC/PRAM reset...

title: 820 2936 after 2 - 5 min image flash and goes down!
message: forgot smc reset.. only tried PRAM reset. ok after applied a SMC reset the machines never more Flash the LCD!! i'm listening music on youtube +15 min and looks fine.. But when i shut down the machine and turn on again after 1-2 min i get same problem!! i will try to run ASD! Thanks

title: 820 2936 after 2 - 5 min image flash and goes down!
message:
You can close this one!! client with hurry! But this mac don't show any errors on ASD test! i will assume problem on Processor or slot ram with problem!

thank you
